title: Abi Wallenstein & Blues Culture - 2007 - Blues Culture FLAC
description:
Abi Wallenstein & Blues Culture - 2007 - Blues Culture

Abi Wallenstein is a legendary figure among European blues artists. His unique style on the 8-string open tuned guitar and fascinating stage presence, coupled with his soulful vocals, give him an extraordinary ability to breathe new life into blues classics, as well as imbuing his original compositions with a rare authenticity. His playing has an effortless and natural quality which never fails to fascinate live audiences. Today he is one of the most highly regarded performers on the club and festival circuit, whether appearing alone, in duos, or with a band.

Track list:
01 - Drive Me Crazy
02 - Blues Culture
03 - Nobody's Children
04 - Who Is He And What Is He To You
05 - Country Blues
06 - Honey Bee Boogie
07 - As Long As I Can See The Light
08 - Good Advice
09 - Don't Mind People Grinnin' In Your Face
10 - Come Back Baby
11 - Keep on Keepin'
12 - Wild Cow Blues
13 - Remove This Rope

Personnel:
Abi Wallenstein - guitar
Martin Rottger - drums, percussion
Steve baker - harmonica, vocals

Enjoy and share!
